description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Unit 4 Lesson B in the Four Corners 4 coursebook, such as "expectation", "aware", "suppose", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosa kata dari Unit 4 Pelajaran B di Four Corners 4 Course, seperti "Ekspektasi", "Sadar", "Misalkan", dll.

en.long: a belief about what is likely to happen in the future, often based on previous experiences or desires

id.long: Keyakinan tentang apa yang mungkin terjadi di masa depan, seringkali berdasarkan pengalaman atau keinginan sebelumnya

en.long: to become aware of a situation or fact

id.long: untuk menjadi sadar akan situasi atau fakta

en.long: to be required to do something, especially because of a rule, agreement, tradition, etc.

id.long: diminta untuk melakukan sesuatu, terutama karena aturan, kesepakatan, tradisi, dll.

en.long: to demand that someone fulfills a duty
used to say what is actually the truth or the fact about something

id.long: dulu mengatakan apa sebenarnya kebenaran atau fakta tentang sesuatu

en.long: realizing or knowing a fact or situation

id.long: mewujudkan atau mengetahui fakta atau situasi
